nodes.text: J-4X was a droid that was active between the years 34 ABY and 35 ABY. J-4X was present when Guavian Death Gang pirate Tara Rashin attacked a cargo vessel, and the droid communicated with a droid repair technician aboard the starship. The droid was shot by Rashin, but later recovered from the wreckage and repaired by the previously mentioned technician.
